actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: Concurrent resolution to declare the need to establish and rehabilitate shelterbelts for the preservation of our soil, water and wildlife resources; and to take the necessary steps to provide incentives for the establishment, cultivation and maintenance of shelterbelts.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that incentives toward the fulfillment of a national soil and water conservation policy should include tax credits and Federal grants to stimulate the development of shelterbelts.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution to declare the need to establish and rehabilitate shelterbelts for the preservation of our soil, water and wildlife resources; and to take the necessary steps to provide incentives for the establishment, cultivation and maintenance of shelterbelts.
